about_the_game:
[Content]
Immerse yourself in the world of Noctuary with this official digital artbook of 172 pages! Including all the character tachies and some art assets' creation process, it's a collection of characters, visual illustrations, backgrounds, storyboards, and concept art, presenting every detail of Noctuary art design.
Thanks for your support, and Gratesca will continue to bring valuable and fun entertainment products to everyone in the future.

[How to access]
Choose Noctuary in your Steam Library – Start the game – Choose the second option [THE ART STORY OF NOCTUARY].
